scripts.build:prod: mkdir -p ../ali-dbhub-server/ali-dbhub-server-start/src/main/resources/static && rm -rf ../ali-dbhub-server/ali-dbhub-server-start/src/main/resources/static/front && cross-env UMI_ENV=prod cross-env UMI_PublicPath=${npm_config_publicPath} umi build && mv dist ../ali-dbhub-server/ali-dbhub-server-start/src/main/resources/static/front
scripts.build:prod-window: mkdir ../ali-dbhub-server/ali-dbhub-server-start/src/main/resources/static && rmdir ../ali-dbhub-server/ali-dbhub-server-start/src/main/resources/static/front && cross-env UMI_ENV=prod cross-env UMI_PublicPath=${npm_config_publicPath} umi build && move dist ../ali-dbhub-server/ali-dbhub-server-start/src/main/resources/static/front
scripts.build:desktop: cross-env UMI_ENV=desktop cross-env APP_VERSION=${npm_config_appVersion} cross-env APP_PORT=${npm_config_appPort} umi build
